name: A Snowball's Chance
description:
A Snowball's Chance is a platformer about a snowball in a hot, hot world. You'll be safe in the shade, but you won't last very long while exposed to the sun's harmful rays!

Use either A and D or the Arrow Keys to move left and right, and press Space to jump and start or restart the game. If it's not responding to input, click in the game window first.

A Snowball's Chance was made by Dan Lance in January of 2016. Its development took one month, and the entire process was streamed live on Dan's twitch.tv channel.

Check out Dan's portfolio to see more of his work, and tune in on twitch Tuesdays and Thursdays at 4pm and Sundays at noon, EST.
